name: TheCoinChat-FlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Hosted by Steve Good and Yuri Cataldo, The Coin Chat is your trusted source for all things cryptocurrency and finance. Each week we dissect an important issue and cut through the noise and misinformation out there in the world of the blockchain, cryptocurrency, Bitcoin, Ethereum, and ICO's to capture the facts that truly matter to you that will give you an edge in this fast-moving emerging market. The Who, What, Where, When and, How of what you need to know in crypto to get ahead so you don't get left behind.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
